google.com.description: Google is the world's most popular search engine, enabling users to find information on the web.

bing.com.description: Bing is a web search engine owned and operated by Microsoft.

linkedin.com.description: LinkedIn is a business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps.

live.com.description: Live.com is a brand for a set of web services and software products from Microsoft.
